sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-scroll' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, Img, ImgWrap } from './InfoElements' const InfoSection = (lightBg, id, imgStart,topLine,light) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
